messages.title: It's about our children's futures
messages.content: Every parent worries about what the future will bring for their kids, but not in Liverpool. Rosie Jolly feels like a fairer future is in their hands thanks to the campaigning work of Colin Eldridge.

messages.title: Their future
messages.content: Colin is fighting for your children's futures.

messages.title: Change that works for you
messages.content: With possibly just weeks to go, there is a mood for change in Britain. Today looks at the only Lib Dem option who could be our next MP.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: 1. Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket. 2. Fair taxes that you only pay on the first Â£10,000 you earn.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fairer chance for every child
keyPolicies.policyDescription: 3. Every child can get ahead with a fair start in life.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair chance for every child
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Give every child a REAL chance

keyPolicies.policyTitle: More jobs by making Britain greener.
keyPolicies.policyDescription: 4. Jobs by making greater Britain greener.
5. A fair deal for you on pensions.
Colin on the fight to make class sizes smaller and get more children on track to fulfil their potential.
Colin led the fight to help local residents turn their community around and get 'Asbos' for untangling gangs.

housing.content: Colin is the choice for everyone who lives in the popular Old Swan and Tuebrook areas.

leaflet.personalStatement: It's a tremendous privilege to stand for election in the area I grew up in and I'm determined to be a strong voice for local people.

politicalExperience.achievements: As a counsellor, he led campaigns on local transport & NHS issues.

endorsements.endorsement: Feels like a fairer future is in their hands thanks to the campaigning work of Colin Eldridge.

quotes.text: 'Prime Minister Gordon Brown compared himself to Margaret Thatcher and insisted he was the Iron Lady's true heir' - Daily Mirror

images.caption: Colin Eldridge with children in classroom setting.
